title: HoP 318 - Oliver Primavesi on Greek Manuscripts
itunes:title: HoP 318 - Oliver Primavesi on Greek Manuscripts
description: Peter's Munich colleague Oliver Primavesi tells us how Greek manuscripts are used to establish the text of authors like Aristotle.
